text: ape wedakama (1)
samahara das manga harinna aa boho uthsaha kala.
(sangithaya mathuwi nawatha maki yayi.

samantha pasadika winaya atuwawe atuwacharin wisthara karana widihata digu kalak thiyena darunu ledak nisa upasthayakayan karadara wena nisa, pilikul karana nisa ehemath nathnam rogaya suwa karanna bari ekak nam aahara prathikshepa karala miyayana eka wagema sansaraya gana kala kirila aahara soyana eka saha walandana eka bhawanawata badhawak kiyala jiwithashawa ath harala bhawanawata aahara prathikshepa karana ekath awath neme kiyala thiyenawa.
yogiya husma desa sihiyen yuthuwa bala sitina wita kayehi wewulana gathiyak danimata piliwana.

ohu penwa dunne, janadhipathi maithripala sirisena janadhipathiwarayage nihathamani swabhawaya nisa eeye wiwrutha kala, guwanpalama maduluwawe sobhitha himiyan saha moragahakanda wyapruthiya ee.en.es kulasinhage nam kala bawayi.
udaharanayak washayen rathu/dumbauru halen pisu bath, dumbauru pan aadiya aaharayata ganna.
mepin balen obatath niwan dakina jathi dakwama pinbara uppaththiyak himiwewa.
habayi wande hariyata karanawa.
passe dewid janse thamayi mata nama thahawuru karala dunne).
eeta wada wadipura thibuna ayath hitiya eeth aduyi.
mata mathak une mage thapal kanthoru ekkena..
bambalapitiyedi pawathi mema tharagaye palamu ardhaya awasan wana wita widyartha widuhala lakunu 13-8 k lesa peramune pasu wiya.
ee wena kawuruwath hinda nemeyi.
me arbuda siyalla madhyaye palana kalaya wasara dekak thibiyadi hadisi mathiwaranayakata yamata thiranaya kala.
adhyapana kadaim pahasuwen pasu karawi.
owun ta danenne meseya:
warnana oona na newa.
enam wasa wisen thora palathuruya.
me mudda hadala thiyenne platinam walin.
panahatagala (adaa 8) palame sita pradhana margaya dakwa sanwardhanaya kirima
denodahak athagaththada samiyaku nathi landune.....
pramanayak wati athayi wartha we.
pada rachanaya premakirthi da alwis thanuwa sangithaya ha gayanaya priya
eya dolar biliyana dekaka sita dolar biliyana hathara dakwa ihala yamak siduwenawa.
ee nisa me amma nirwindanaya karannata minisunta sidda wuna.
eyage atha mata thamayi karanna wenne .
bolada bawen thora aadaraye mihirak natha.
ee anuwa paya 16ka kalayak thamayi apita ithiriwa thibenne.
shuwar ekata pathalaya samaga thibunu sambandhathawak binda watenna athi...
mewara swarna pusthaka sammanaya labunu kruthiya gana nam mama katha karannawath akamathiyi.
wassata ahuwuna maha polowen nagina suwande thiyena nawum bawata samana wenawada alutha upan bilindakuge suwanda?
ehenan oyath awamaya gewapu yugayak thiyenawa.
aushadha walinma rogaya palanaya kirimata uthsaha ganima sarthaka na.

mema pudgalayin yapanaya, madagal pradeshaye padinchi wayasa awurudu 19 saha 29 wana wiye pasuwana pudgalayin wana athara, athadanguwata ganna lada kerala ganja thogaya, pudgalayan saha kuda yathrawa idiri nithimaya katayuthu sandaha kankasanthureyi, polisiya wetha bhara dimata katayuthu karana ladi.
neda me nathiwela yanne.
ee nisa ethuma samanga da honda sambandhathawak thibena apekshakayek thamayi gamata awashya wanne.
ape punchi diyaniyata nama thibbe ewa kiyala eke arthaya wune “jiwithaya denniya” kiyana ekayi.
wimale ankal mata awith kiwuwa mallige puka tharam akkage puka thada naha kiyala.
labena pa්rathicharath ekka wenada mata kiwwe me rata wenuwen obathuma wishala karya bharayak karanawa, rata wenuwen handak nanganawa kiyala.
aadarayak hithe athi wela.
palamuwa nomile liyapadinchi wi obage namin ginumak sada ganna
lankawa sambandhayen wideshiya wartha karuweku athin liyawuna dirghathama wuda , wishishtathama wistharaya lesa mema granthaya ithihasagatha we.
poddak hithanna oyath saththunge mas kanawa neda?
anathura nowalakwiya hakinam me jiwitha bera gannata thibini.
age athi lipiyak basso .

hamudapathi hamiltan wanasinha, 1989 di jawipeta erehiwa awasan satana meheyawu mejar janaral sisil waidyarathna, aarakshaka lekam jenaral sepala aatigala, bi්ragediyar laki algama yana ihala hamuda niladharin da janadhipathi lekam ke.ech.je. wijedasa mahatha da owunta hamuda mulasthanayedi muna gasini.
adi 900 ka demahal niwasak)

ee wagema thawath pirisak prakasha karanne me simanirnaya pilibanda thibena gatalu, sthawarathwaya pilibanda palath sabhawe thibena gatalu kantha niyojanaya pilibanda thibena gatalu aadiya sambandhayen awashya sanshodhana genawith meya anumatha kara ee matha padanam wi api chunda pawathwiya yuthuyi kiyana eka.
shuddhawu kuranayata garu karana saba bathimathun obata aaradhana wa sathya wenuwen adahas prakasha karanna.
ranilta wiruddhawa dawantha wyaparayak arambaimata kalaya  kalaya awith
nododa muwin, hamuwi denethin, maga hara yana kenek sathiye dawas pahe kohe hari hitiyanam, sathi anthaya mona karadarayakdayi hithewi…..

thakshanaye diyunuwa ha punaruda samaya samangama owun ratawal aakramanaya kirimata patan gaththe pradhanawama welanda aramunu mulika karagenaya.kadu,kinisi,damwal walata aminu katu sahitha yaguli wenuwata owun thuwakkuwa dakwa parinamaya wuha.aththenma kaduwakin gela ho athpa sinda maradamimata wada thuwakkuwakin hisata eka undayak pamanak bhawithakara maradamima ketharam shishta sampannada?

rathnapura adhikaranaye wibhaga wemin pawathina naduwakata idiripath nowima hethuwen adhikaranaya wisin himinamata nikuth kala warenthuwak bharadimata ema sarayanwaraya kipa wathawakma ema wiharasthanayata giyath ema himinama masayaka pamana kalayaka sita wihasthanayen panagos sangawi sita athi bawa polisiya kiyayi.
eya, oba wanima nisi aakaraye danumak namathiwa wisadimata idiripathwana aya ha obe gataluwata wisadum sewimata kal gatha nokaranna.
ee nisamado badu sanshodhana gena eemen dina kihipayak gathawannatath pera rate janathawage chandayen theri path wi parlimenthuwa niyojanaya karanu labana manthriwaru 225 dena sandaha danata labena

maha pragnyawen lokaya wiwara kala
(samanyayen warthawa labimata awama washayen sathi dekak pamana gathawe.)

thaman saha thawalingam mahatha mema samalochana kamituwe sitima sadacharathmaka da yanna pilibanda sakachcha kirimata awasthawak laba dena lesa illa mathiwarana komisame sabhapathi mahinda deshapriya mahatha, kathanayaka wetha lipiyak da yomu kara athi bawada warthawe.
me wakyaya kiyawanna.
ee kiyanne ohela dennama mawa rawattuwa.
waththala pradeshiya lekam ema bodhiya galawa iwath karana bawata ema pradeshaye hamuduruwarunta saha pradesha wasinta tharjanaya kara atha.
me anuwa ‘isurumuni pem yuwala’ yanuwen handunwana nirmanayata saliya ashokamala wasthu wishaya wiya nohaki da?
eheth osteraliyanu aadhara matha shri lankawe bim bomba iwath kirime niratha ef.es.di.

aluth kathawak samaga nawa balaporoththu athi kara ganimin maraya nawatha gamata paminethamana siduwu de gammunta pawasimata thibu lajjawath lide watuna kena lin katinma eliyata aa yuthuyi kiyana adahasath athikaraganimin aanandage upades matha kriyathmaka wana maraya palamuwa rata gaya mitaraye rosa pata kotuwe sitina (dewani kotase thiyena waguwa ) thama hithawathma mithureku wana drakiwa muna gasi me wistharaya (aananda kiwwa wistharaya) pawasayi
